items.title: If you bought a gold bar at Costco last year, here is what it's worth now
items.description: Gold hit a record $3,578 per ounce before declining Thursday, driven by weak jobs data and investor concerns about tariffs and Federal Reserve policy ...

items.title: Private sector added 54,000 jobs in August, below expectations, ADP says
items.description: The figure reported on Thursday is below economists’ estimates of an increase of 65,000 jobs and also down from the prior month’s revised reading of 1...

items.title: How NYC Dem socialist mayoral candidate's $30 minimum wage plan could lead to job losses
items.description: New York City mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani's $30 minimum wage plan could lead to employers replacing lower-skilled workers with automated tools li...

items.title: Salesforce cuts 4,000 jobs due to AI, CEO says
items.description: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff said AI automation helped the software company cut its customer support headcount from 9,000 to 5,000 human workers.

items.title: McDonald's CEO warns of 'two-tiered economy'
items.description: McDonald’s CEO Chris Kempczinski warned of a "two-tier economy" as the company reintroduced its Extra Value Meals to draw budget-conscious customers.
